Text:
A little note: Hope that you know, that after running .cmd file you must not remove the other file or move it to some other folder..

That cmd file is just for registering the library (.ax) file.

Alternative to running the .cmd file just run the following at the command promt:

regsvr32 VodeiMPAVI.ax

or

regsvr32 VodeiMPAVI.ax /s

Running without "/s" gives you a confirmnation that the registration was successfull.

It worked for me. Thanks a lot. I hate vodei.

Be Careful! It's vodei decoder file - don't install this.

Article http://www.vladd44.com/video/vodei.php is a bit obsolete, now new easier solution is available: http://vodecoder.videoripper.org/ But, unfortunally, new solution works only for vodei 2.x encoded files - not working to decode vodei 1.0
